name: Anti-Viral
description:
Anti-Viral is a bullet hell style game about navigating a small ship simply by touching on the place you want to take it to.

The concept is to create a fast paced bullet hell experience without having to shoot the enemies. You can destroy enemies by luring them to obstacles and dealing damage. In this prototype you can lure them to some rocks to deal damage, the ships will disappear once they take enough damage.

Design: Varun Raj K

Art: Online stock images

Code: Venkatasubba Raju
